attributes.action: Make all Dentists Free and available for all Full Time Students at University
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Students at University are not earning enough to afford the costs of dentists in the UK. Even the NHS Fees are too expensive for most students. Also a Dentist should be automatically assigned to every university in the UK so that it is guaranteed that the students have access to one. I think most Universities have a doctor for their students so I believe dentists should also be provided.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
